conclusion: Use Faraday's Law of Electromagnetic Induction to determine potential difference.
The side length of the square wire frame is 0.2 meters.
Calculate area of the loop in the magnetic field as 0.02 m^2.
The magnetic field is increasing at a rate of 10 T/s.
Calculate rate of change of magnetic flux as 0.2 Wb/s.
Apply Faraday's Law to find induced emf as -0.2 V.
Determine potential difference between points a and b as 0.1 V.
